name: ChickenThrow
description:
Small game Made for Gdevelop5 Game Jam2. 

You are Trapped in this cursed land with your trusty pet The Chicken. Your Goal is to  leave thru the darkness, upgrade your pet and have fun. The idea was to have 5 different pets witch they are in the game but have no upgrades and i disable them. Sound had major issue and disable this too. Decide to upload it anyway to see if people will like or hate the thing. 

Controls are : Move W/A/S/D , mouse click for use the pet and pick upgrades.
